column1:
how do I see member available to join cluster
how do get available members
how do I see member ready to join the cluster
column2:
very easy, from gclish run command:
> show cluster members state 
And look for members with state REQEUST_TO_JOIN

column1: which log should I look for elasticXL issues
column2: Relevant logs for procisioning issues are: /var/log/exl_detection.log
